LogTab.CreateIssueTooltip: Click to open the Create Issue popup (after authenticating with github) to fill in the form and submit and issue to the Repo
LogTab.DebugLevelWarning: AutoDuty can't change the log level dalamud uses. To see debug related things, you have to go in the dalamud log "/xllog" and set the appropriate level in the top left.

Auth.InBrowserPaste: in your browser and Paste it

IssueForm.Title: Issue: Bug Report
IssueForm.DuplicateWarning: Please make sure someone else hasn't reported the same bug by going to the issues page and searching for a similar issue. If you find a similar issue, please react to the initial post with a thumbs up to increase its priority.
IssueForm.WhatHappenedHelp: Also, what did you expect to happen? Please put any screenshots you can share here as well.
IssueForm.ReproStepsHelp: List all of the steps we can take to reproduce this error.
